entry.title: The NBA Logo
entry.summary:

The episode mentions that Jerry West doesn’t like being the logo — and also that the NBA has not publicly admitted this to be the case …
entry.content:
An episode of 99PI mentioned that the NBA Logo is a silhouette of Jerry West (and that this is a widely known open secret).

The episode mentions that Jerry West doesn’t like being the logo — and also that the NBA has not publicly admitted this to be the case, but that seems to not be true anymore at least as recently as that October 2021 article.

entry.title: DeAndre Hopkins
entry.content: Whenever he scores a touchdown, DeAndre Hopkins tries to find his mother (who was blinded in an acid attack) in the crowd, to give her the football.
